thread.title: Anyone for a brew of lukewarm European ingredients?
thread.title_full: Anyone for a brew of lukewarm European ingredients?

title: Anyone for a brew of lukewarm European ingredients?
text:
Anyone for a brew of lukewarm European ingredients? Lord Rose said he wasn’t much of a fan of Europe but that it would be too dangerous to drop out Daniel Leal-Olivas/PA Google+ 1 of 1 Lord Rose said he wasn’t much of a fan of Europe but that it would be too dangerous to drop out Daniel Leal-Olivas/PA Patrick Kidd Published at 12:01AM, October 13 2015 
Brave move, holding a press-opp in a brewery. The Guild of Sketchwriters love a good metaphor.   air. 
Brave, too, to give your campaign name a set of initials that conjures up an image that helps your opponents. Britain Stronger in Europe — BSE. It brought to mind a queue of mad cattle shuffling off to the abattoir and a Brussels ban on British beef. Perhaps not the picture that the In crowd were hoping for. 
Since 
  Blairesque baloney as Dave pushed grassroots buttons Last updated at 12:01AM, October 8 2015 
It   the best lines delivered straight down the barrel of the camera What a spectacle as Boris flattens Zac Published   act   Sponsored Editorial
